text: Svetlana Kuznetsova was the defending champion, but she lost to Li Na in the second round. Justine Henin defeated Samantha Stosur 6–4, 2–6, 6–1 in the final. ==Seeds== The top two seeds received a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==External links== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Porsche Tennis Grand Prix - Singles Category:Porsche Tennis Grand Prix
title: 2010 Porsche Tennis Grand Prix – Singles
